description: The purchase of the Laboratory and Scientific Equipment – SA E60PV-19EQUI, three (3) Growth Chambers - by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada’s Eastern Service Center, to be delivered to the St. John’s Research and Development Center, according to the indicated requirements in the tender notice.
full_summary:
================================legalArgumentException
### Request for Proposal - Purchase of Three Growth Chambers

**Reference:** cb-770-25860618

**Solicitation #:** 01B46-23-195

**Publication Date:** 2023-12-12

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-01-18, at 14:00:00

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

**Procurement Method:** Competitive Selective Tendering

#### Background

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada's Eastern Service Center is seeking the purchase of three (3) Growth Chambers, in accordance with requirements outlined in the attached solicitation document.

#### Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to provide the necessary Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, including the following:

* Three (3) Growth Chambers

#### Delivery and Terms

The Growth Chambers will be delivered to the St. John's Research and Development Center.

#### Contract Information

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-12-22
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-29

#### Tender Evaluation

The tender evaluation will be based on the lowest price.

#### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2023-12-12
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-18, at 14:00:00

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:
Rachael Johnston
Email: [rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca](mailto:rachael.johnston@agr.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 548-4918

### Access to Solicitation Document

The solicitation document can be accessed at the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26895/23-195---npp.pdf

### Note

Please note that this tender is a Request for Proposal (RFP) and is subject to the terms and conditions outlined in the solicitation document.
